Rose (Rosy) Cersonsky

Role in the Cersonsky Lab: Leslie Knope

Things I’m excited about right now: Getting the research of the Cersonsky lab up and running!

Cool stuff I’ve done: Professionally? I’ve written some good code, published some cool papers, given lots of talks, and won a few awards.

Outside of the lab, I love to run, climb, bake, and be in the outdoors!
